title: BRIEF-‍Prairie Provident Resources says average production in Q4 was 4,872 BOE/D
text:
March 29, 2018 / 4:41 AM / Updated 36 minutes ago BRIEF-‍Prairie Provident Resources says average production in Q4 was 4,872 BOE/D Reuters Staff 
March 29 (Reuters) - Prairie Provident Resources: 
* PRAIRIE PROVIDENT ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS 
* AVERAGE PRODUCTION IN Q4 WAS 4,872 BOE/D, COMPARED TO 4,845 DURING SAME PERIOD IN 2016​ 
* ‍FULL-YEAR 2018 GUIDANCE ESTIMATES REMAIN UNCHANGED FROM THOSE PRESENTED IN COMPANY’S RELEASE DATED FEBRUARY 6, 2016​ 
* QTRLY OIL AND NATURAL GAS REVENUE $20.5 MILLION VERSUS $17.1 MLN‍​ * QTRLY AFFO EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.38 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
